title: News: BRIT Awards Nominations 2012
body:
UPATE: The nomination announcements are over and to be honest I don’t know why I bothered, in my opinion a terrible line up.

Artists pay top dollar to submit themselves for awards like this therefore it’s usually no real representation of the true musical geniuses of our time. Feel differently? Share your view in the comments below. SG

The nominations for the [BRIT Awards 2012](http://www.brits.co.uk) have been  announced tonight in the build up to the actual award ceremony later this year. People with strong constitutions can read the full list below.

Brit Award Nominees for British Male:

James Blake

James Morrison

Noel Gallagher

Professor Green.

Nominees for the British Female award are:

Adele

Florence Welch

Jessie J

Kate Bush

Laura Marling

**Nominees for the British Breakthrough award are**:

Anna Calvi

Ed Sheeran

Emeli Sandé

The Vaccines.

**Nominees for the Group award are:**

Artic Monkeys

Chase and Status

Coldplay

Elbow

Kasabian

**The nominees for British Single are:**

_(Click the artist to stream the song via YouTube)_

[Adele ‘Someone Like You’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hLQl3WQQoQ0)

[Ed Sheeran ‘The A Team’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X0dnp5E8FMo)

[Example ‘Changed The Way You Kissed Me’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CLXt3yh2g0s)

[Jessie J feat. B.O.B ‘Price Tag’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMxX-QOV9tI)

[JLS feat. Dev ‘She Makes Me Wanna’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FuwTgZOKcf8)

[Military Wives / Gareth Malone ‘Wherever You Are’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0hR6O7VxKaQ)

[Olly Murs feat. Rizzle Kicks ‘Heart Skips A Beat’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j5dFe-WKuPs)

[One Direction ‘What Makes You Beautiful’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QJO3ROT-A4E)

[Pixie Lott ‘All About Tonight’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=swcULf1ATyU)

[The Wanted ‘Glad You Came’](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ggzxInyzVE)

**The nominees for International Male Solo Artist are:**

Aloe Blacc

Bon Iver

Bruno Mars

David Guetta

Ryan Adams

**The nominees for International Female Solo Artist are:**

Beyonce

Bjork

Feist

Lady Gaga

Rihanna

**The nominees for International Group are:**

Fleet Foxes

Foo Fighters

Jay-Z / Kanye West

Lady Antebellum

Maroon 5

**The nominees for International Breakthrough are:**

Aloe Blacc

Bon Iver

Foster The People

Lana Del Rey

Nicki Minaj

The Brits are the British Phonographic Industry’s annual pop music awards. The name originated as a shortened form of ‘British’, ‘Britain’ ‘Britannia’, but later became a backronym for **British Record Industry Trust**.

Robbie Williams holds the world record for the most Brits, winning twelve as a solo artist and another five awards as part of pop group Take That, thus demonstrating the complete absurdity of the majority of nominations.
